meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that converts sugars into lactic acid.
meanings.sent1: Lactobacillus helps in making yogurt by changing sugars into lactic acid.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a supplement with lactobacillus for better digestion.
meanings.sent3: The lactobacillus in the milk party was the one turning all the sugar into acid!
meanings.sent4: The lactobacillus worked tirelessly, like a tiny sugar-to-acid factory.
meanings.sent5: Imagine tiny lactobacillus bacteria dancing as they transform sugar into acid.

meanings.definition: Any of various rod-shaped bacteria of the genus Lactobacillus, some of which are used as probiotics.
meanings.sent1: I take a daily supplement of lactobacillus to keep my gut healthy.
meanings.sent2: Lactobacillus bacteria are often found in fermented foods like kimchi.
meanings.sent3: The lactobacillus in the probiotic drink waved hello to the other bacteria.
meanings.sent4: The lactobacillus in my gut is like a helpful little rod-shaped friend.
meanings.sent5: The rod-shaped lactobacillus bacteria stood guard in my intestines, protecting me.
